name: Dragon Ball FighterZ: Day One Edition
summary:
Dragon Ball FighterZ: Day One Edition:
- 3 vs 3 Tag/Support allows players to train and master more than one fighter/style for deeper gameplay.
- New characters, such as Goku, Vegeta, Gohan, Cell, Frieza, Majin Buu, Gotenks, Kid Buu and Adult Gohan.
